text: Alijor Aşurmamadov (; born on 20 August 1970) is a former Tajikistani footballer who played for FC Lokomotiv Moscow, FC Anzhi Makhachkala, and FC Irtysh. He was a member of the Tajikistan national football team. ==Career== ===Managerial=== On 23 January 2018, Panjshir appointed Ashurmamadov as their manager. ==Career statistics== ===International=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !colspan=3|Tajikistan national team |- !Year!!Apps!!Goals |- |1992||2||2 |- |1993||0||0 |- |1994||0||0 |- |1995||0||0 |- |1996||2||2 |- |1997||5||1 |- |1998||0||0 |- |1999||2||0 |- |2000||2||2 |- |2001||0||0 |- |2002||0||0 |- |2003||0||0 |- |2004||0||0 |- |2005||0||0 |- |2006||1||0 |- !Total||14||7 |} ===International goals=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" ! # !!
